name: Life Pit
description:
Life is a deep pit. No one has escaped from there. When you want to run away, you face a lot of big obstacles.

When you face some troubles, you have 3 options, wait till it evaporates, take red pill or face it. Everyone starts with the first. Waiting. Some people select the second one. Escaping the life pit. Only the ones who has courage takes third option. Facing the problem. This is the only way you could win this!

Everybody faces obstacles,
Some of them gets punch from the face

Everybody lives.
Everybody dies.


CONTROLS

A&D or Right&Left Arrows to move around.

W or Up Arrow to slow down.

S or Down Arrow to get faster.

If you pick up the green posion you slow down.

If you pick up the lotus flower you become immortal.
